review: I was surprised at how many movies had to be rented to watch. Other than that, I am very pleased with my purchase.
author: Debrah L.

review: we have not had any luck using the Fire TV Stick. Similar to many of the other reviews, we were not able to get a good internet connection thru our wi-fi even though other devices were connected and working fine. I tried changing the direction (vertical at 90 degrees, vs horizontal) like some of the other reviewers mentioned and it still kept buffering while trying to watch a TV show episode. This will be returned to Amazon.
author: Nikki E.

review: Best decision I ever made was to cancel my cable and get the fire stick
author: sondra "Sondra Williamson"

review: it's is prime day but deal is too short, I can't place an order
author: Kelvin

review: I was waiting for prime day to purchase it... And now I've been in the waitlist since 10AM. Still have not been notified...
author: Julissa Pena

review: The Fire TV Stick has opened new venues for me. I haven't developed it's true potential yet, but I see a lot of potential maybe even "Good bye" cable!
author: Chas
